about_the_game:
Tatonka the Space Whale is an exhilarating twin-stick shooter that takes players on an epic interstellar adventure. Immerse yourself in a captivating storyline as you assume the role of a courageous mother whale, desperately scouring the vast reaches of space in search of her lost husband and children.

Equipped with a formidable mounted gun on her back, the player must navigate treacherous cosmic environments and engage in intense battles against a diverse array of adversaries. Prepare to confront menacing squids, formidable space ships, and other awe-inspiring space creatures, all intricately designed with captivating sea-themed aesthetics.

Your journey through the cosmos will push the limits of your piloting skills as you masterfully dodge enemy attacks, strategically position yourself, and unleash devastating firepower upon your foes. With each progressive level, the challenges grow more daunting, demanding quick reflexes and precise aim to overcome relentless opposition.

Tatonka the Space Whale offers an enthralling blend of high-octane action and emotionally charged storytelling. Experience the determination and resilience of a mother's love as you navigate through beautifully rendered cosmic landscapes and encounter captivating characters along the way.

Embark on an unforgettable adventure in Tatonka the Space Whale, where the fate of a family hangs in the balance, and the vastness of space becomes your battlefield. Will you triumph over the cosmic odds and reunite the lost members of your pod? It's time to embark on an intergalactic odyssey unlike any other.
﻿

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Sci-fi, Space themed. 2D, Fast Paced, Twin Stick shooter. Play as Tatonka in her story to reunite her family or play as her and other characters in a rogue lite type wave survivor.
